properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 6:16PM PST until February 6 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...Persistent light snow to continue over the Central Panhandle
Mountains of Idaho...

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in
the mountains and 2 to 4 inches in the valleys.

* WHERE...Kellogg, Pinehurst, Osburn, Wallace, Mullan, Fourth of
July Pass, Dobson Pass, and Lookout Pass.

* WHEN...Until 2 PM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will slowly rise on Thursday
with valleys transitioning to rain or wet, non-accumulating
snow.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS EXPIRED
